wikitext.*:
'''''tinw''''' is a [[Noldorin]] word meaning "spark, small [[stars|star]]".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 393</ref>

[[David Salo]] has suggested that the form ''tinu'' (retaining the same meaning) could be valid [[Neo-Elvish|Neo-Sindarin]].<ref>{{HM|GS}}, p. 332</ref>

==Etymology==

*Root [[TIN]]<ref name=LR/>

==Synonyms==
* ''[[êl]]''
* ''[[gíl]]''

==Examples==
*[[Tindómiel]] - "Morning Star"

==See also==

*''[[tinnu]]''
*[[Sindarin]] ''[[tîn#Noun|tîn]]''
